data.text:
A Place for Gathering

Since time immemorial, communities have had a gathering place. That place often resided in a special location, sometimes in the center of a village, often in the shade of an ancient tree. Now the Marvin Williams Center joins that dynasty of community gathering places as it serves the community of West Bremerton and beyond.

The Marvin Williams Center was created to encourage widespread public access and enjoyment. This 20,000 square foot, two story, state of the art facility is designed to foster a sense of community and provide a platform for extraordinary events. Whether it is a kids basketball game, a cooking class or a wedding reception, the Marvin Williams Center provides a beautiful and comfortable setting for all.

What the facility has to offer

The Marvin Williams Recreational Center will have lots going on every day. Throughout the year, there will be beneficial programs offered for toddlers to adults, such as: Toddler Gym, Ballroom Dance, Youth Mentoring, Academic Tutoring, 30 Minute Meals and many more!

The facility is also a perfect place for your event, both large and small. You can rent a single room, such as our Cooking Theater Classroom for a gourmet cooking class, or reserve the entire facility for a large event. Our 7,000 square foot gymnasium is a multi-purpose facility which can easily be transformed into a beautiful site for a wedding reception, inaugural banquet, trade show, birthday, anniversary celebration or any special occasion.

Some of the great features of the MW Center include:

An Open and Inviting Lobby & Courtyard

Meeting Room Rentals

Celebration & Social Event Rentals

Commercial Catering Kitchen

Cooking Theater Classroom

Open Gym

Free Wifi

Computer Lab

Locker Rooms

Contact us today to reserve space for your event:

events@mwcenter.org or 360-377-6000
